tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RiskModel (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    creator_name VARCHAR(50),
    create_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Portfolio (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_name VARCHAR(100),
    assets TEXT[],
    total_value DECIMAL(18, 2),
    risk_tolerance DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE PortfolioRisk (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id INT,
    risk_model_id INT,
    risk_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES Portfolio(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (risk_model_id) REFERENCES RiskModel(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Risk_Assessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    investment_id INT,
    risk_score DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES Risk_Models(model_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (investment_id) REFERENCES Investments(investment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Optimized_Portfolios (
    optimized_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id INT,
    model_id INT,
    total_return DECIMAL(8,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES Portfolios(portfolio_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES Risk_Models(model_id)
);
